thread.section_title: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand | acerentalcars.co.nz
thread.title: Peter
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by Peter

author: Peter
title: Peter
text: Every time I rent a car from Ace, I am extremely pleased with the car and the service from the staff. The prices are reasonable and the cars have always been easy to drive and reliable. I have used Ace for years and hope to for many years to come.
